name: Recent Purchase History Grid for Woocommerce
author: Hasi Weragala

sections.description:
Recently purchased items grid for Woocommerce

This simple plugin showcases the currently logged in user’s recent purchases in a standard woocommerce product grid.

The grid can be configured via Settings -> Purchase History Grid

The plugin uses a standard wordpress shortcode to display the grid so that it can be embedded using any wordpress page builder.

Screenshots

  1. Settings -> Purchase History Grid shows available options for the grid.
